API Collection# BidirectionalCollection Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/DiscontiguousSlice/BidirectionalCollection-Implementations#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Swift/DiscontiguousSlice/BidirectionalCollection-Implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var last: Self.Element?`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/last)The last element of the collection.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/Swift/DiscontiguousSlice/BidirectionalCollection-Implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func difference<C>(from: C) -> CollectionDifference<Self.Element>`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/difference(from:))Returns the difference needed to produce this collection’s ordered elements from the given collection.[`func difference<C>(from: C, by: (C.Element, Self.Element) -> Bool) -> CollectionDifference<Self.Element>`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/difference(from:by:))Returns the difference needed to produce this collection’s ordered elements from the given collection, using the given predicate as an equivalence test.[`func formIndex(before: inout Self.Index)`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/formindex(before:))Replaces the given index with its predecessor.[`func index(before: DiscontiguousSlice<Base>.Index) -> DiscontiguousSlice<Base>.Index`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/index(before:))Returns the position immediately before the given index.[`func joined(separator: String) -> String`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/joined(separator:)-4yy0x)Returns a new string by concatenating the elements of the sequence, adding the given separator between each element.[`func last(where: (Self.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows -> Self.Element?`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/last(where:))Returns the last element of the sequence that satisfies the given predicate.[`func lastIndex(of: Self.Element) -> Self.Index?`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/lastindex(of:))Returns the last index where the specified value appears in the collection.[`func lastIndex(where: (Self.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows -> Self.Index?`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/lastindex(where:))Returns the index of the last element in the collection that matches the given predicate.[`func popLast() -> Self.Element?`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/poplast())Removes and returns the last element of the collection.[`func removeLast() -> Self.Element`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/removelast())Removes and returns the last element of the collection.[`func removeLast(Int)`](/documentation/swift/discontiguousslice/removelast(_:))Removes the given number of elements from the end of the collection.
